name: fragz for me
description: This is a 4-leveled deathmatch WAD for DoomII. MAP01: A big "castle", left by the dark forces in a burning town destroyed in the 4th world-war MAP02: A house owned by a PSYCHO-family after the 4th world-war MAP03: A classic deathmatch level (hasn't got anything to do with the 4th world-war). WOW! MAP04: Another castle, left by the dark forces in a burning town destroyed in the 4th world-war
